t: NFL Properties - Wikipedia
s: March 18, 2025 - NFL Properties is the merchandising and licensing arm of the National Football League (NFL). The subsidiary of the league was founded in 1963 to maintain control of the brands of the league and its franchises and to license and negotiate with vendors to create official NFL merchandise.
